title: Castilho (Alexandre Magno de)
body: This naval officer and writer visited Madeira several times and married a Madeiran lady, D. Carlota de Almeida Afonseca. He passed away in Funchal on January 19, 1871. In his book *Roteiro da Costa Africa Occidental*, there are some elements that contribute to the history of our archipelago.

D. Carlota de Almeida Afonseca: Wife of Alexandre Magno de Castilho

1871: Death of Alexandre Magno de Castilho
